alert.note: Alert for Northern Cook, Northern Lake; Southern Cook, North Shore; Southern Lake, North Shore (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 04 at 2:55AM CST until February 05 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM TO 6 PM CST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 5 inches with some local accumulations around 6 inches along coastal Cook County due to lake enhancement. * WHERE...Northern Cook and Lake, Southern Lake and Southern Cook Counties. This includes the Tribal Lands of the Grand Portage Reservation. * WHEN...From 4 AM to 6 PM CST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The cold wind chills as low as 25 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Gusty southerly winds may cause some blowing and drifting snow.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. Road conditions can also be found at 511mn.org for Minnesota or 511wi.gov for Wisconsin.

area.areaDesc: Northern Cook, Northern Lake; Southern Cook, North Shore; Southern Lake, North Shore
